mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( idx, profile_img_loc, email, u_name, nicName, phonenumber, sex, u_year, u_month, u_day, password, cornfirm, type, gall_count, user_subscribe_count ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL(idx), #{profileImageLocation}, #{email} #{name}, #{nickanme}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sex}, #{u_year}, #{u_month}, #{u_day}, #{u_month}, #{u_day}, #{password}, #{confirm}, #{gall_count}, #{u_subscribe_count})
